items.title: The Listing Presentation Of A Top Producer

visible_instructors.title: Aaron Novello
visible_instructors.name: Aaron
visible_instructors.job_title: Master The Art of Real Estate Sales

items.headline: By Aaron Novello
objectives_summary: Being able to list property in high volume is critical to your success as a real estate sales person. In the residential resale business all of the leverage and income is on the listing side. When you list a property you become the employer and everyone else becomes the employee. At the end of this course you will be equipped with the mindset and skills required to present powerfully on your listing appointments and dramatically increase the probability of getting a listing agreement signed.
